name: Sports & Fitness Vocabulary
description: Essential terms for sports, exercise, fitness training, and athletic activities.
context: sports, fitness, exercise, and athletic performance

words.meaning: the ability to sustain prolonged physical effort
physical strength and energy for sustained activity
ability to move quickly and easily
the organization of different elements working together effectively
the quality of bending easily without breaking
a person who competes in sports
a series of contests between competitors
the activity of competing against others
a contest to determine the best competitor
the process of preparing for sports or fitness
a person who trains athletes or teams
an official who supervises a game or match
the tools and gear used in sports
a way of carrying out a particular skill
the action of accomplishing a task or activity
